short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save tab groups or all tabs inside a window as a single bookmark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
somanytabs allows you to save tab groups or all tabs inside a window as a single bookmark.
You can use Chrome to sync it across all your devices and when you open the bookmark, your tabs and groups will be restored.
